name: Re: Race Maze
description:
Patreon Twitter Discord

ANNOUNCEMENT: Since #FinishThatRemakeJam is gonna be a thing (lol wut), I'm going add some more features I wanted for this game and didn't have time to! Stay tuned! //( =^ｪ^꞊)/

Race your friends through procedural mazes with obstacles! The more, the merrier!

This is a remake from my first game, which was lost in time some years ago.

My entry for #RemakeJam, originally made on GameMaker when I was a child.
